resources.string:
1. The wordlist is mapped into a hashmap with the first three-letter as key, and the list of words as values. Code and wordlistmap are included and stored in the assets folder.
Source to discuss the method from stackoverflow: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/29918587/how-to-find-a-word-in-large-word-list-vocabulary-with-descent-memory-consumpti
\n\
2. Source of the beep: https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Beep-09.ogg
\n\
3. images are all taken by myself currently.
